components.label: Description
components.content: The driver was operating a motor vehicle or had care and control of a motor vehicle for the purposes of MVA section 215(1) based on: *

components.label: Was a prescribed test used to form reasonable grounds?
Why was a prescribed test not used?

values.label: Opinion formed the driver was affected by alcohol and/or drugs

components.label: Current User Roles
components.customDefaultValue: const localdata = localStorage.getItem('UserDetails') && (JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('UserDetails'))) || []; value = localdata?.groups?.map(group => group.replace(new RegExp('^/+|/+$', 'g'), '')) || [];
